NAME true

COL 1

DLG SPR_0
"""
im a cat

honest
"""

DLG ITM_0
There once was a girl named Gale

DLG ITM_4
"""
uh

hair can't tell limericks
"""

DLG ITM_5
There once was a girl named Gale

DLG ITM_1
Who rode atop a big space whale

DLG ITM_6
Who rode atop a big space whale

DLG ITM_2
When people asked "{shk}Why??{shk}"

DLG ITM_3
She flew and she flew

DLG ITM_7
Their bond was special

DLG ITM_8
And tight as a pretzel

DLG ITM_9
And tight as a pretzel

DLG ITM_a
She'd simply reply:

DLG ITM_b
Even higher she'd fly

DLG ITM_c
She'd explain with a sigh

DLG ITM_d
Till her face turned quite blue

DLG ITM_e
Where to, no one knew

DLG ITM_f
I tell you it's true!

END 0
{wvy}"Sure beats a boat with a sail!"{wvy}

END 1
{wvy}And never did it grow stale{wvy}

END 2
{wvy}"Just trying to pick up my mail"{wvy}

END 3
{wvy}And continue along on her trail{wvy}

END 4
{wvy}And that was the end of her tale{wvy}

END 5
{wvy}To them, it was just a detail{wvy}

END 6
{wvy}Limerick? No, this is a folktale{wvy}
